document.full_text: russian gas exporter gazprom, having just signed a trio of deals in india that could be worth over $90 billion, now has it sights on the markets of europe and north america, a source close to the company said on thursday.
document.title: gazprom set for more after huge india deals: source
lines_and_colors: russian gas exporter gazprom, having just signed a trio of deals in india that could be worth over $90 billion, now has it sights on the markets of europe and north america, a source close to the company said on thursday.
